code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function FunctionalComponent(){const[count,setCount]=useState(0);const increment=()=>setCount(count+1);const decrement=()=>setCount(count>0?count-1:0);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"counter-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Function Component"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"count-number",children:count}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"btn-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:increment,className:"btn plus",children:"+"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:decrement,className:"btn minus",children:"-"})]})]});}export default FunctionalComponent;
